alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued June 25 at 5:37PM MST until June 25 at 6:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 615 PM MST. * At 537 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from South Mountain Park to near Chandler Fashion Center Mall to Seville, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 164 and 192. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 144 and 162. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 34 and 44. Locations impacted include... Chandler, Casa Grande, Sun Lakes, Maricopa, Queen Creek, Chandler Heights, Bapchule, Estrella Sailport, Olberg, Firebird Lake, Sacaton, Santan, Ak-Chin Village and Komatke. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake. Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
